titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2342) to authorize appropriations for the Coast Guard for fiscal year 1988, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-205.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 305 - 96 (Record Vote No: 246).

bill.summary: 7/7/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2342 (Coast Guard funding). Lays on the table H. Res. 195, providing for the consideration of such bill.
